event.teaser: The conference for open source geo applications in the federal government.
event.address:
Red Cross
1730 E Street NW,,
Washington, DC 20006
event.registration_title: Modern Tools for GIS, Geo Data & Cartography
event.registration_teaser:
Register now for only $85! The price goes up after August 31.

Special Discounts:

  • Government employees discount (20%), use code: GOVT16
  • Student discount, use code: STU16 (20%)
event.registration_body: Open source applications are changing GIS, cartography, web mapping, and map publishing, throwing open the door of what's possible in geo. This one day conference will introduce you to these tools, show you what you can do with them, and walk through how and why government agencies are using them to dramatically improve their mapping, cartography, and GIS projects.
